WHY_ME.TITLE: Why me
WHY_ME.DESCRIPTION:
I am a skilled Frontend Developer with strong expertise in Angular and a growing focus on Node.js.
I enjoy building modern, responsive web applications, tackling complex problems, and continuously expanding my technical skills.
My passion for clean code, scalable architectures, and innovative solutions makes me ready for exciting new challenges in full-stack development.

SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills
SKILLS.CHALLENGE: I am always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need.

PROJECTS.TITLE: My Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_PEYTOR: Invoice and client management for the self-employed and small businesses. Create invoices with PDF export and use AI for text and invoicing assistance.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_JOIN: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_SHARKIE: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie to find coins and poisoned bottles to fight against the crazy orca.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_CRM: CRM system that can be used as an interface between different departments in a hospital.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_DABUBBLE: A chat platform in the style of Slack. Create channels, send messages and files, and manage users.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_POKEDEX: An interactive web application that allows real-time retrieval and search of Pokémon data. Developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, the project connects API integrations with a user-friendly interface.

ABOUT.TITLE: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues said about me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_RESPONSIVE: Here what my colleagues said about me.

ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_BENJAMIN: It was a pleasure to work on the 'Join' project together with Peter. He consistently found the right solutions to problems, and through his organized approach and consistent diligence, he maintained a high work pace.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_BORNA: Peter is a very committed and reliable colleague. His ability to solve complex problems and his passion for programming make him a valuable member of the team.

CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Still not sure if I am the right person for your project? Contact me so I can reassure you. Let us work together.
